DialogueText.Text: Hey! I was just passing through the Jungle when I was attacked by these terrifying creatures! They seemed similar to the local wildlife of the area, but were overrun by this... this
! They were almost beyond recognision! Not only that, they were far more agressive than usual; I barely made it out of there! Consider yourself warned. I'd stay out of there if I were you.
If I had to wager a guess, I'd say this was the work of the Godseeker's Head Engineer. Cruel experiments such as this make up a large portion of his work... or uh, so I've heard.
